name: playYouTubeVideo
description: play the audio of a YouTube video in a Discord voice channel

searchQuery.description: the name or description of the video I am looking for, e.g. Minute Waltz

url.description: the URL of the video I am looking for, e.g. https: //youtu.be/3H0SRv8QNwk?si=4TpbSXKz0Lsbh2Ui
